name: Illinois - Single filer at median income
description: Single person earning $60,000 annually in Illinois (flat 4.95% state tax)

sources.description: Calculated using 2026 IRS tax brackets and Illinois flat 4.95% state income tax
sources.notes: Federal: std deduction $16,100, taxable $43,900, federal tax $5,020. Illinois: 4.95%*$60,000=$2,970. SS: $3,720. Medicare: $870. Total deductions: $12,580. Net: $47,420.
